WFSLayer

public WFSLayer(java.lang.String name,
                java.lang.String title,
                java.lang.String type,
                java.lang.String projection,
                Extent extent)
constructor: create new layer of a wfs server

Parameters:
String - name - layer name
String - title - layer title
String - type - layer type (point/line/polygon)
String - projection - layer projection (epsg code of the layer's coordinate system)
Extent - extent - extent/bounding box of the layer

isActive

public boolean isActive()
get selection status of the layer

Returns:
boolean - true: layer is active and shown at the map, false: layer is inactive and not shown

setActive

set selection status of the layer

Parameters:
boolean - act - true: layer is active and will be shown at the map, false: layer is inactive and will not be shown
